text: With season 10 of “ RuPaul ’ s Drag Race ” just getting underway, its a good time to take a look back at the first nine winners ( as well as the three All Star champs ) and find out what these dozen dames have been up to since being crowned America ’ s favorite drag queens. In the photo gallery above, catch up with each of these fierce fillies. The very first winner was BeBe Zahara Benet who edged out runner - up Nina Flowers way back on March 23, 2009. Since she sashayed off with the title, BeBe has been one busy bee. She released eight singles and one EP, “ Kisses & Feathers. ” And she just made it to the final four on “ RuPaul ’ s Drag
